quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Mom
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, title, summer. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of the fast-food joint where Sue Ellen worked in Dont Tell Mom the Babysitters Dead?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Clown Dog

questions.question: Who plays the character of Sue Ellen Crandell on the comedy movie Dont Tell Mom the Babysitters Dead?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Christina Applegate

questions.question: According to the film The Lost Boys, Santa Carla is also known by what other name?

options.text: the vampire capital of the world
the murder capital of the world
The town didnt have another name in the film.
the carnival capital of the world

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the murder capital of the world

questions.question: How does Walter break his leg in the comedy film Dont Tell Mom the Babysitters Dead?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Falling off the roof

questions.question: In the movie Dont Tell Mom the Babysitters Dead, when the babysitter dies, the kids wrap her up in a rug and drag her to the trunk of the car.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Where does Ms. Candrell go on summer vacation in the movie Dont Tell Mom the Babysitters Dead?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Australia

questions.question: What was the original title of  the movie Dont Tell Mom the Babysitters Dead?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Real World

questions.question: Complete the note the kids leave with the babysitters body in the movie Dont Tell Mom the Babysitters Dead:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nice old lady

questions.question: Did Joanna Cassidy play the role of Rose Lindsey in Dont Tell Mom the Babysitters Dead?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: At what clothing company did Sue Ellen work in the comedy film Dont Tell Mom the Babysitters Dead?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: GAW (General Apparel West)

questions.question: Was Christina Applegate nominated for Best Female Performance for her role in the movie Dont Tell Mom the Babysitters Dead?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: What are the names of the two brothers who educate Sam about Santa Carlas vampire population in the movie The Lost Boys?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Edgar and Alan Frog

questions.question: In the movie The Lost Boys, the main characters move to which small coastal town in California?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Santa Carla

questions.question: Two of the main characters in The Lost Boys were played by these iconic eighties actors who starred together in several other films, including Dream A Little Dream.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Corey Haim and Corey Feldman

questions.question: The movie Dont Tell Mom the Babysitters Dead was released on June 7, 1991.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Lost Boys
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, frog, title. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the film The Lost Boys, where did Sam, Michael and their mother live before moving to Santa Carla?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Phoenix, Arizona

questions.question: Kiefer Sutherlands half-brother, Angus Sutherland, has a role in The Lost Boys: The Tribe.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The title of the movie The Lost Boys was inspired by this childrens novel.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peter Pan

questions.question: Despite all their knowledge about vampires, the Frog Brothers have never staked a vampire before meeting Sam and Michael. What is the name of the first vampire the Frog Brothers kill in the film The Lost Boys?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marko

questions.question: He played Doc Gaylen Adam on the television program Gunsmoke.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Milburn Stone

questions.question: He was the voice of Dr. Adams on the radio version of Gunsmoke and most notably he played the role of Floyd the Barber on The Andy Griffith Show.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Howard McNear

questions.question: The movie The Lost Boys won only two awards. It won the Saturn Award for Best Horror Film and Corey Feldman won Best Young Actor in a Horror Motion Picture.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the film The Lost Boys Michaels love interest also happens to be Davids girlfriend. What is her name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Star

questions.question: The sequel to The Lost Boys is titled The Tribe. However, it was originally intended to be entitled The Lost Girls.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of the following is not used by Sam and the Frog Brothers to kill vampires in the film The Lost Boys?

options.text: water balloons filled with holy water

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: water balloons filled with holy water

questions.question: William Conrad played Nero Wolfe and Frank Cannon - two detectives of unique proportions.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: His wife was Ruby Dee and together they build a career in movie and television and were both very active in the Civil Rights movement. He starred as the operator of the baitshop in Grumpy Old Men.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ossie Davis

questions.question: In the movie The Lost Boys, the Frog Brothers convince Sam that the only way to help Michael would be to stake him in the heart and kill him.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: The movie The Lost Boys was released  July 31, 1987.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of the following lines was not delivered by Edgar Frog, one of the characters in the Lost Boys?

options.text: As a matter of fact, were almost certain ghouls and werewolves occupy high positions at city hall.
This is just a cover; were dedicated to a higher purpose. Were fighters for truth, justice, and the American way.
One thing about living in Santa Carla I never could stomach .... all the damn vampires.
We trashed the one that looks like Twisted Sister.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: One thing about living in Santa Carla I never could stomach .... all the damn vampires.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Actress
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, josef, dicaprio. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Josef von Sternberg made this lady a star when he cast her as Lola-Lola in The Blue Angel.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marlene Dietrich

questions.question: What is the name of the sequel to 2007s Transformers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Transformers 2 Revenge of the Fallen

questions.question: How do the Transformers from the self-titled movie learn English?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The World Wide Web

questions.question: I would do anything Tim Burton wanted me to. You know, have sex with an aardvark. Johnny Depp and Tim Burton have a mutual admiration society. In which of the following movies has Tim Burton NOT directed Johnny Depp?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Finding Neverland

questions.question: Bernie Mac has a clown at his car lot when he sells Bumblebee to Sam Witwicky in the film Transformers.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who directed the 2007 smash hit Transformers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Bay

questions.question: Which of the following is not a type of vehicle considered to be in the movie Transformers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 747

questions.question: What happened to the Allspark after the movie Transformers came out?

options.text: It was given to a friend.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It was sold on eBay.

questions.question: Where is Sector 7 according to the movie Transformers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In the Hoover Dam

questions.question: Which of the following Leonardo DiCaprio movies did Martin Scorsese NOT direct?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Catch Me If You Can

questions.question: Quentin Tarantino has called this actress his muse. He cast her as Mia in his classic movie
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Una Thurman

questions.question: The Coen brothers, Joel and Ethan, have produced, written and directed such films as O Brother, Where Art Thou and Millers Crossing.  Joel Coen is most often credited as director. Who is the actress that has starred in, among others, in Blood Simple and The Man Who Wasnt There? Does she have an inside track with Joel Coen? You betcha!
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frances McDormand

questions.question: What is the name of Sam Witwickys best friend in the movie Transformers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Myles

questions.question: In the 2007 movie Transformers, Bumblebee is an autobot, disguised as what kind of car?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Camaro

questions.question: Alfred Hitchcock was known as the master of suspense and for his use of cool elegant blonds actresses. One blonde actress he hired after spotting her on a commercial for Sega diet drink. Although he made her the star of his movies The Birds and Marnie he became very controlling. What actress bought back her contract rather than star in any other Hitchcock films?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tippi Hedren

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Longest Day and Nicole Kidman
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, people. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: From what 1999 movie is the quote I see dead people?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Sixth Sense

questions.question: Who wrote the book on which the war film The Longest Day is based?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cornelius Ryan

questions.question: Who wrote the screenplay of The Longest Day?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cornelius Ryan

questions.question: Richard Todd played British Major John Howard in the war drama The Longest Day. Which statement about him is true?

options.text: Todds twin brother was also in the movie.
Todd was married to Elizabeth Taylor at the time.
Seventeen years after he hit the beaches on D-Day, Todd portrayed an attacking British soldier.
Todds father and uncle had participated in the D-Day attack.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Seventeen years after he hit the beaches on D-Day, Todd portrayed an attacking British soldier.

questions.question: Sean Connery and two 007 enemies participated in The Longest Day.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In The Longest Day, Private Steele becomes deaf because his parachute is caught on a church steeple and is very close to the bells. Who portrayed this parachutist?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Red Buttons

questions.question: Nicole Kidman starred as Satine in this directors production of Moulin Rouge. Yet it was in this directors film for Chanel # 5 that Nicole Kidman became the highest paid per minute actress in the world.  What director filmed the 3-minute Chanel # 5 spot with Nicole Kidman?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Baz Luhrmann

questions.question: Who is the author of the musical theme of the movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paul Anka

questions.question: Wes Anderson has many actors that appear quite often in his films. Can you name the college friend of Wes Andersons that appeared in The Darjeeling Limited and co-wrote Rushmore with Anderson?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Owen Wilson

questions.question: Which American Rock and Roller played a US Ranger in The Longest Day?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fabian Forte

questions.question: When did the The Longest Day war drama come out?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1962

questions.question: Who portrayed Brig. Gen. Theodore Roosevelt, Jr. in The Longest Day?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Henry Fonda

questions.question: Much of The Longest Day was filmed in Corsica in Mediterranean Sea. There was a nudist colony just 2 miles from the beach where the movie was filmed.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Henry Grace played General Eisenhower in The Longest Day. Which statement about him is untrue?

options.text: Grace had portrayed Eisenhower in two other war movies before 1964.
Grace was never an actor until this movie.
Zanuch considered using Eisenhower to play himself.
The Germans never figured that Eisenhower would be in charge of the attack.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Grace had portrayed Eisenhower in two other war movies before 1964.

questions.question: Which one of these was not among the directors of The Longest Day?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: James Jones

options.text: Damn, do you copy me at all?
I have a bad feeling about all this.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Houston, we have a problem.

questions.question: Which character from the 1939 movie Gone with the Wind utters the phrase As God is my witness, Ill never be hungry again?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: an antenna

questions.question: What actor uttered the popular phrase Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer in the 1974 movie The Godfather Part II?

questions.question: In the movie Kingpin Bill Murrays character, Ernie McCracken, has a clear bowling ball with a skull in the middle of it.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the 1994 comedy Dumb and Dumber, how many times do Lloyd and Harry say yeah while singing to Mental in the car?

questions.question: From what 1931 horror movie is the popular line Its alive! Its alive!?

questions.question: Which of these quotes is from the 1968 science fiction movie Planet of the Apes?

options.text: Take your stinking paws off me, you damned dirty ape!
Dont look at me like that, with those horrible black eyes, like dolls eyes!
I believe something smells here... I think thats you.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Take your stinking paws off me, you damned dirty ape!

questions.question: The famous line Ill be back, or a variation of it, was used in which Terminator movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: In Theres Something About Mary what actor plays the character who turns out to be Woogie?

questions.question: Youre gonna need a bigger boat is a quote from this 1975 movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jaws

questions.question: What is the first name of Dan Akroyds character in the 1988 movie The Great Outdoors?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Roman

questions.question: What actor plays Craigs dad in the 1995 movie Friday?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Witherspoon

questions.question: What is the flag on James Bond’s parachute in the skiing scene in the movie The Spy Who Loved Me?

options.text: The Skull And Bones Pirate Flag

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Union Jack

questions.question: In the film Major League, while trying to recruit players to come to spring training, General Manager Charlie Donovan calls Jake Taylor (played by Tom Berenger). Taylor thought it was a joke being played on him by a fellow player. What players last name did he use in the phone conversation?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tolbert

questions.question: Who directed and starred in the comedy movie The Ladies Man?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jerry Lewis

questions.question: Who is the villains gigantic steel-toothed henchman in the movie The Spy Who Loved Me?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jaws

questions.question: Who is the villains evil henchwoman in The Spy Who Loved Me, who chases James Bond in a helicopter?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Naomi

questions.question: Which of the following did veteran pitcher Eddie Harris NOT use as a foreign substance to doctor the baseball in the movie Major League?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: K-Y jelly

questions.question: What hip hop duo was featured in the 1990 comedy movie House Party?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kid n Play

questions.question: Before he was offered the Indians managerial job in the film major League, Lou was a former manager for what minor league team?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Toledo Mud Hens

questions.question: In the movie Major League the Cleveland Indians are controlled by the former-showgirl widow of the recently deceased owner. Who was the owner that passed away on their honeymoon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Donald Phelps

questions.question: Who performs Nobody Does It Better, the theme song of the movie The Spy Who Loved Me?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carly Simon

questions.question: In Major League, in the tiebreaker game for the playoffs against the NY Yankees, the Indians are down 2-0 before Cerrano hits a two-run homer to tie. In what inning did Cerrano hit his homer?

questions.question: Catcher Jake Taylor, played by Tom Berenger in Major League, was a former All Star for what Major League team according to team management?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Boston Red Sox

questions.question: When Ricky Wild Thing Vaughn, played by Charlie Sheen in Major League, tries out for the team he is clocked using a radar gun. How hard was he throwing when manager Lou Brown turned and asked the scout?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 96 mph

questions.question: In the movie Major League, Jakes girlfriend Lynn, played by Rene Russo, is a former Olympic swimmer. What Olympics did she qualify for?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1980 in Moscow
